name: The event name
description: Enter an informative description of your event here
about: Enter text describing what this event is about (e.g. dolphin sightings, microbial sampling, or harmful algal blooms.

location.name: The name of the place(s) the event is intended to take place in
location.description: Enter the geospatial region which encapsulates the intended range of activities in this planned event, see https://book.oceaninfohub.org/thematics/spatial/README.html

funding: Official name of grant / funding mechanism
organizer: Official name or URL/DOI/URI of the coordinating organization or individual
superevent: url to any Events that encapsulate this one
citation: Enter a DOI for any literature or published work relevant to this time series

contributor: A person or organization who contributed to this event series
